desc: I’m currently in the pre-production phase of a 14 minute short film for a new electronic music duo to be released early February. I can send you the song to reference the music if you’re interested. A possible visual reference is Daft Punk“Interstella 5555”/“Electroma” & 1980s sensibility (think Blade Runner, 80s era comics). Music is similar to Porter Robinson, Madeon, Phoenix, or Daft Punk.I've attached a tentative script/storyboard for the Intro track, along with photos of a) the actress that will be in the video and b) misc. references photos for the vibe.All work will be credited and highlighted.
